name: Prison Name Generator
description: Stuck behind bars and need a new identity? Our Prison Name Generator will craft the perfect alias to maintain your mystique, whether you're running the yard or just trying to blend in. Get a name that commands respect (or at least avoids unwanted attention).
introduction: So, you're looking for a new name, huh? Maybe you're writing a gritty novel, designing a video game character, or... well, let's just say you need a pseudonym for 'reasons.' Our Prison Name Generator is here to help! We'll whip up a moniker that's tough, memorable, and maybe even a little intimidating. Prepare to be reborn with a name that screams 'don't mess with me!'
howToUse: Click the 'Generate' button. (It's kinda hard to miss.)
Admire the awesomeness of your new prison-worthy name.
Repeat until you find the name that perfectly embodies your inner tough guy (or gal).
Use your new name wisely. We're not responsible for any trouble you get into... or out of.

faqs.question: Is this generator actually useful if I'm, you know, *in* prison?
faqs.answer: Probably not. Access to the internet might be a bit limited. But hey, maybe you can memorize a few names and impress your cellmates later.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my Dungeons & Dragons character?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! A hardened criminal background can add some serious depth to your rogue or fighter. Just be prepared to explain your character's... unique skill set.

faqs.question: Will these names help me avoid getting shanked?
faqs.answer: We can't guarantee that. A cool name is a good start, but you might need to work on your intimidation tactics and situational awareness too.

faqs.question: Are these names based on real criminals?
faqs.answer: Nope! They're purely fictional creations, inspired by the tropes and stereotypes of prison life. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or dead, is purely coincidental... and slightly concerning.

faqs.question: My generated name is 'Fluffy Bunny.' Is the generator broken?
faqs.answer: It's not broken, just...surprising. Sometimes the toughest guys have the most unexpected nicknames. Embrace the irony! Or, you know, just generate another one.

faqs.question: Can I trademark the name that I generate?
faqs.answer: While we encourage creativity, we make no guarantees about the uniqueness or trademarkability of the generated names. Use at your own risk!
